text: Heremites is a genus of skinks. ==Species== The following 3 species, listed alphabetically by specific name, are recognized as being valid: *Heremites auratus (Linnaeus, 1758) – levant skink, golden grass mabuya, golden grass skink *Heremites septemtaeniatus (Reuss, 1834) – golden grass mabuya, southern grass skink *Heremites vittatus (Olivier, 1804) – bridled mabuya, bridled skink Nota bene: A binomial authority in parentheses indicates that the species was originally described in a genus other than Heremites. ==References== Category:Lizard genera Category:Taxa named by John Edward Gray
title: Heremites
